title: Are you a baby? A litmus test
description: Good morning! The other day some friends and I were reminiscing about an app idea we had years ago that would allow you to “blind cancel” on your friends. That is—flag if you were open to canceling a plan, which would only be revealed if the other person flagged it too. Basically, it was Tinder for bailing. This was our ultimate dream: an official, guilt-free conduit for that quiet hope that your friends wants to cancel, too.
